main event: An unidentified flying object was sighted and reported in North Forestville, Maryland on October 13, 1968.
interesting points: The observer described the object as a silvery gray flying object with a circular shape and a bright, glowing light., The sighting lasted approximately 10 minutes during which the object hovered and maneuvered., The observer reported seeing red lights on the object as it traveled steadily from north to south., There were no radar paintings or other identified objects in the sky at the time of the sighting., The report suggests the sighting could be identified as a hoax due to the nature of the observed object.
witness description: The witness, whose name is redacted, was reported to be in the area observing the object.
